ee.etos: ((L1_L0ElectronDecision_TOS==1 && L1_L0Calo_ECAL_realET > threshold_el && L1_PT > 0) || (L2_L0ElectronDecision_TOS==1 && L2_L0Calo_ECAL_realET > threshold_el && L2_PT > 0) )
ee.gtis: ( ( B_L0PhotonDecision_TIS || B_L0ElectronDecision_TIS || B_L0HadronDecision_TIS || B_L0MuonDecision_TIS ) && !(H_L0HadronDecision_TOS==1 && H_L0Calo_HCAL_realET > threshold_kp && H_PT > 0) && !((L1_L0ElectronDecision_TOS==1 && L1_L0Calo_ECAL_realET > threshold_el && L1_PT > 0) || (L2_L0ElectronDecision_TOS==1 && L2_L0Calo_ECAL_realET > threshold_el && L2_PT > 0) ) )
